companion_1.name: Borin the Brave
companion_1.description: A stalwart fighter who increases your attack and draws enemy attention.

companion_2.name: Lyra the Swift
companion_2.description: A nimble scout who increases your speed and critical chance.

companion_3.name: Eldon the Wise
companion_3.description: A sage who bolsters your magic and restores a small amount of MP each battle.

companion_4.name: Mira the Healer
companion_4.description: A caring companion who provides occasional healing during exploration and battles.

companion_5.name: Tharos the Bulwark
companion_5.description: A veteran guardian whose presence greatly increases defense and enemy taunt chance.

companion_6.name: Seraphine the Arcane
companion_6.description: A master of the arcane who significantly boosts MP and spell power for the party.

companion_7.name: Ragnar the Warlord
companion_7.description: A fearsome warrior that drastically increases attack and critical damage.

companion_8.name: Astra the Lifegiver
companion_8.description: A legendary healer whose aura restores HP after each battle and provides large healing boosts.

companion_9.name: Nyx the Shadow
companion_9.description: A silent killer that increases critical chance and deals extra damage from stealth.

companion_10.name: Galen the Tactician
companion_10.description: A battlefield planner who grants small party-wide buffs and improves mission rewards.

companion_11.name: Skiff von Stratoscrate
companion_11.description: A master of forbidden magics who greatly enhances spell power and MP regeneration, born from the darkness of the abyss, she's known as the lord of the abyss.

companion_12.name: Baijiang the shade
companion_12.description: A stealthy ninja who excels in speed and critical strikes, mastering the art of silent elimination.
